column1: #Text=Bumi says : " What kind of prison does n't have any bars or walls ?
#Text=I read about that in ancient text .
#Text=The fog is actually a spirit that infects your mind and slowly drives you mad , imprisoning you in your own darkest memories .
#Text=" Kya says : " How long can we be trapped in here ?
#Text=" Zhao says : " I am Zhao the Conqueror .
#Text=" Kya says : " Hopefully we 're not trapped in here as long as that guy .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " If we stay together , we 'll find Jinora and make it out of this fog .
